description: Master source list for Ralph. Each source tracks scraping pipeline progress.

validStatuses.completed: ALL URLs attempted (100%) + builds extracted + no blocks

pipelineFields.urlsFound: URLs discovered and saved to urls.json

pipelineStages.1_url_discovery: Find all vehicle/build URLs on the domain
pipelineStages.2_html_scraping: Download HTML for each discovered URL
pipelineStages.3_build_extraction: Extract structured build data from HTML

sources.name: OneOff Autos
sources.notes: SKIP: Modern SPA with no public listing URLs. Site requires JavaScript rendering/authentication. Sitemap contains only static pages. No vehicle inventory available without login.

sources.name: RaceMarket
sources.notes: SKIP: JavaScript-heavy site using AJAX/masonry to load listings. Static HTML contains no item URLs. Would require browser automation (Selenium/Puppeteer) for scraping. Not feasible with HTTP-only approach.

sources.name: Lomar Refined
sources.notes: Stage 2 COMPLETE: All 30/30 URLs successfully scraped via MCP webReader. Python DNS blocked but MCP bypasses it. Content includes Ferrari, Lamborghini, Porsche, Rolls-Royce, Aston Martin tuning builds. Ready for Stage 3 (Build Extraction).

sources.name: Total Cost Involved
sources.notes: SKIP: Static image gallery with ~295 car builds displayed on a single page. No individual detail page URLs - each build is shown as a thumbnail with caption (e.g., '1969 Camaro, Pro IFS, Born Vintage Hot Rods'). Builds are embedded in the page as HTML content without separate URLs. Would require parsing the single gallery page and extracting build data from the HTML/captions, but this is not the target content type (individual build pages with detailed specs, photos, modifications).

sources.name: ECD Auto Design
sources.notes: URL discovery COMPLETE via MCP webReader: Fetched all 17 pages, extracted 338 unique project URLs. URLs saved to urls.json. Ready for HTML scraping stage (Stage 2). Python DNS still blocked but MCP webReader successfully bypassed it for URL discovery.

sources.name: Charlie's Custom Creations
sources.notes: SKIP: Static single-page gallery with ~69 car builds. Image thumbnails with captions (e.g., 'Michaels 1956 Ford F100', 'Jameys 1968 Plymouth Road Runner'). No individual detail page URLs - builds embedded as HTML content. Filterable by category (Cars/Trucks/Other) but all on same page. Not target content type.

sources.name: UTV Source
sources.notes: SKIP: Static gallery with no individual detail pages. Verified via MCP webReader: Page shows 47 build cards (thumbnails with names like '2024 Can-Am Maverick R - Janey Lee') but these are display elements only, not clickable links to detail pages. Pagination links exist (?page=2, ?page=3) but return identical content. This is a marketing showcase page, not a browsable catalog of build detail pages. Not target content type.

sources.name: Creative Bespoke
sources.notes: SKIP: DEALERSHIP INVENTORY - Verified via MCP webReader. Shows luxury cars for sale (Bentley Flying Spur, Ferrari 812, Lamborghini Aventador, etc.) with prices and 'Photos (21)' links to dealer inventory detail pages. These are dealer listings, not custom build project pages with modifications. Not target content type.

sources.name: Lifted Trucks
sources.notes: SKIP: DEALERSHIP INVENTORY - Verified via MCP webReader. Marketing copy page about 'why buy a lifted truck' with no vehicle listings visible. JavaScript-heavy dealer site showing lifted trucks/SUVs for sale (not custom build projects). Dealer inventory pages, not target content type.

sources.name: RevMatch
sources.notes: SKIP: Web application requiring authentication. No public build gallery. Users create build sheets behind login - not scrapable via HTTP.

sources.name: Tacoma World Build Threads

blockEvents.details: Tacoma World blocks all paginated URLs beyond page 1 (returns 404 'The requested page could not be found'). Only first page of each forum accessible without authentication/session cookies. Total accessible: 148 threads from 3 first pages. Missing: 7,706 threads (98.1%).

sources.notes: BLOCKED: Tacoma World pagination requires authentication/session cookies. Verified via MCP webReader that page-2/ and beyond return 404 errors. Only 148/7,854 threads accessible (1.9%). Site uses anti-scraping protection - pagination links exist but return errors when accessed directly. Consider browser automation (Selenium/Puppeteer) with valid session or API access if available. URLs saved to urls.json represent accessible content only.
